inputs.name: subject-path
inputs.description: Path to the artifact serving as the subject of the attestation. Must specify exactly one of "subject-path",  "subject-digest", or "subject-checksums". May contain a glob pattern or list of paths (total subject count cannot exceed 1024).

inputs.name: subject-digest
inputs.description: Digest of the subject for the attestation. Must be in the form "algorithm:hex_digest" (e.g. "sha256:abc123..."). Must specify exactly one of "subject-path", "subject-digest", or "subject-checksums".

inputs.name: subject-name
inputs.description: Subject name as it should appear in the attestation. Required when identifying the subject with the "subject-digest" input.

inputs.name: subject-checksums
inputs.description: Path to checksums file containing digest and name of subjects for attestation. Must specify exactly one of "subject-path", "subject-digest", or "subject-checksums".

inputs.name: predicate-type
inputs.description: URI identifying the type of the predicate.

inputs.name: predicate
inputs.description: String containing the value for the attestation predicate. String length cannot exceed 16MB. Must supply exactly one of "predicate-path" or "predicate".

inputs.name: predicate-path
inputs.description: Path to the file which contains the content for the attestation predicate. File size cannot exceed 16MB. Must supply exactly one of "predicate-path" or "predicate".

inputs.name: push-to-registry
inputs.description: Whether to push the attestation to the image registry. Requires that the "subject-name" parameter specify the fully-qualified image name and that the "subject-digest" parameter be specified. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: show-summary
inputs.description: Whether to attach a list of generated attestations to the workflow run summary page. Defaults to true.

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: The GitHub token used to make authenticated API requests.

outputs.name: bundle-path
outputs.description: The path to the file containing the attestation bundle.

outputs.name: attestation-url
outputs.description: The URL for the attestation summary.

evidence.reasoning: The action generates attestations for build artifacts, which is primarily related to security by ensuring the integrity and authenticity of the artifacts. It also involves build processes and includes documentation for the inputs and outputs.
